description: This file defines a REST controller named HelloController that provides basic endpoints such as a welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info for a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for health check, documentation, and info in the products API backend.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/' and returns a welcome message.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/docs' and redirects to Swagger UI, preserving request URL scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/health' and returns application health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/api/info' and returns application information.
